metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3866 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information-exposure vulnerability was discovered where openstack-mistral's undercloud log files containing clear-text information were made world readable. A malicious system user could exploit this flaw to access sensitive user information.

criterions.comment: mistral: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
